items.Name: Supremo Fitness Corporate Challenge
items.Description: The contest encourages employees to train on new products while competing and sharing insights with others. Feedback will be leveraged by product marketing. While training, they watch videos and share experiences on the community boards for the new product. The prize is an extra day off.
